reviewText: I've attempted ordering this product twice, and got the 'Perfect Collection' instead both times, which is supposed to be vol. 1 and 2 of the newer version of the anime, but is actually vol. 1 and 3. If anyone knows where I can get the actual 'I Don't care About Destiny' product, please let me know.

This compacted version is the best ever! I was a little skeptical at first, but it is exactly the same as the four liscensed discs, only you get all the episodes for the price of one disc! The voices and graphics are high quality and identical to the version that is 4 discs long that you buy at your local store. This version saves money and space! I loved it! Thanks to whoever invented the compact box sets!
This is a BOOTLEG edition! Gravitation has already been licensed and dubbed! This version is inferior! Stay away fans!
